BattleEffectText.Name: Resilience
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can prevent {0} instances of status ailments from being applied. A stack of this status is lost whenever a status ailment is blocked by this. Resilience can be further reduced by winning clashes against certain Combat Pages.

BattleEffectText.Name: Youâ€™ll Be My Main Ingredient!
BattleEffectText.Desc: Targeted by Greta. Greta recovers 8 HP whenever her attack hits this character.

BattleEffectText.Name: Captured Librarian
BattleEffectText.Desc: If this character's HP reaches 0, the librarian dies. Only takes Stagger damage from librarians. When Staggered, the librarian is freed next Scene, losing some HP and Stagger Resist.
